abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-user-mobil: Whether or not a user is editing through the mobile interface
mobile-frontend-categories-subheading: The page belongs to the following categories:
mobile-frontend-categories-nocat: This page doesn't belong to any category, yet.
mobile-frontend-categories-nodata: There was an error. Have you added some categories to save?
mobile-frontend-cite-error: A problem occurred while attempting to load citations due to a bad revision identifier.
mobile-frontend-cite-none-available: There are no citations available for this page.
mobile-frontend-contributions-404-desc: Cannot look for contributions without a user or with a user that does not exist.
mobile-frontend-copyright: Content is available under $1 unless otherwise noted.
mobile-frontend-diffview-404-desc:
The ID for the revision you requested does not exist.
This is usually caused by following an outdated diff link to a page that has been deleted or a diff link containing invalid characters.
mobile-frontend-editor-anonwarning: Warning: You are not logged in. Your IP address will be publicly visible if you make any edits. If you log in or create an account, your edits will be attributed to your username, along with other benefits.
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-ti: You have been blocked from editing {{SITENAME}}
You have been blocked from editing this page
mobile-frontend-editor-cancel-confirm: Do you really want to abandon your edit?
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled: This page is protected to prevent vandalism.
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled-anon: You need to log in to edit this page.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-conflict: Error, another user has edited this page.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-preview: Error, something unexpected happened upon loading the preview. Please close and try again.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing: By saving changes, you agree to release your contribution under the $1 {{PLURAL:$2|license|licenses}}.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing-with-te: By saving changes, you agree to the $1 and agree to release your contribution under the $2 {{PLURAL:$3|license|licenses}}.
mobile-frontend-editor-new-page-confirm: {{GENDER:$1|Are you sure you want to create}} a new page on {{SITENAME}}?
mobile-frontend-editor-placeholder: This section is empty. Be the first to expand it!
mobile-frontend-editor-placeholder-new-p: {{GENDER:$1|You are creating}} a new page on {{SITENAME}}!
mobile-frontend-editor-success-landmark-: Congratulations, you are now a {{SITENAME}} editor!
mobile-frontend-editor-success-new-page: Congratulations on creating a new page!
mobile-frontend-editor-summary-request: How did you improve the page?
mobile-frontend-editor-uploadenable: Please upload a photo first to enable editing.
mobile-frontend-expand-sections-descript: Always expand sections of all pages by default.
mobile-frontend-fontchanger-desc: Adjust font size for better readability.
mobile-frontend-generic-404-desc: The page you are looking for could not be found.
mobile-frontend-generic-login-new:
{{SITENAME}} is made by people like you.
Log in to contribute.
mobile-frontend-history-404-desc: Cannot look at history for a page that doesn't exist. It may have been deleted or you may have followed a bad link.
mobile-frontend-history-no-results: The filter provided no history matches.
mobile-frontend-languages-404-desc: A valid title must be specified.

mobile-frontend-media-load-fail-message: There was an error while loading this image.
mobile-frontend-nearby-noresults: Quiet out here... There weren't any pages found with nearby topics.
mobile-frontend-nearby-noresults-guidanc: Try creating a new page or adding location to an existing one
mobile-frontend-nearby-permission-denied: You have denied access to Location Services for {{SITENAME}}. To change this please visit your browser or device settings
mobile-frontend-nearby-location-unavaila: {{SITENAME}} cannot determine your location. Please try again with a better signal.
mobile-frontend-nearby-requirements: Sorry! Your web browser doesn't support {{SITENAME}} Nearby.
mobile-frontend-nearby-requirements-guid: Try a different browser or enable JavaScript if you've disabled it.
mobile-frontend-nearby-info-description: You can read about interesting {{SITENAME}} articles about places around you
mobile-frontend-opt-in-explain: {{SITENAME}} βeta is a way for you to try these experimental features and provide us with valuable feedback
mobile-frontend-references-citation-erro: An error occurred and it was not possible to load this citation.
mobile-frontend-requires-mobile: This page is not available on desktop. Please click the mobile view link at the bottom of the page.
mobile-frontend-requires-optin: This page is not available unless you opt into our beta mode. Visit the [[Special:MobileOptions|settings page]] to opt in.
mobile-frontend-save-error: Error saving settings. Please make sure that you have cookies enabled.
mobile-frontend-search-content-no-result: {{int:mobile-frontend-search-content}} to see if this phrase appears anywhere.
mobile-frontend-talk-reply-info: Note your reply will be automatically signed with your username.
mobile-frontend-talk-topic-error: The topic can't be added due to an unknown error.
mobile-frontend-talk-topic-error-protect: This talk page is protected, you don't have the permission to add topics to it.
mobile-frontend-talk-topic-error-permiss: The topic can't be added. You don't have the permission to edit pages.
mobile-frontend-talk-topic-error-spam: The topic was refused because it contained a spam fragment.
mobile-frontend-talk-topic-error-badtoke: There was an error on the server. Your edit can't be saved. Try reloading this page.
mobile-frontend-talk-topic-wait: Saving your new topic, please wait.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-a-z-empty-howt: You are not currently watching any pages. Your watchlist helps you keep track of the pages that you are interested in. Watch pages by tapping the star icon.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-cta: Keep track of this page and all changes to it.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-feed-empty: There are no pages with recent changes.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-please-wait: Please wait, the watch action is taking longer than expected.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-error: There was a problem watching this page. Please try again.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-purpose:
A watchlist helps you bookmark pages and keep track of changes to them.
Log in to see it.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-signup-action:
A watchlist helps you bookmark pages and keep track of changes to them.
Sign up to start one now.
mobile-frontend-user-page-no-owner-page-: You don't have a user page yet
mobile-frontend-user-page-describe-yours: You can describe yourself to fellow $1 on your user page
mobile-frontend-user-page-desired-action: This page should be created and edited by $1
mobile.css: /* All CSS here will be loaded for users of the mobile site */
mobile.js: /* All JavaScript here will be loaded for users of the mobile site */
tag-mobile_edit-description: Edit made from mobile (web or app)
tag-advanced_mobile_edit-description: Edit made by user with Advanced mode
tag-mobile_web_edit-description: Edit made from mobile web site
mobile-frontend-search-feedback-prompt: Couldn't find what you were looking for?
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-MFEnableWi: Learn about the subject of the page with a short description below the title
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-MFShowFirs: Text will always show above infoboxes, improving performance and readability.
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-MFEnableFo: Control the font size of your reading experience.
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-amc-experi: Advanced mode provides easy access to talk pages, history pages, user tools, and other editing tools.
mobile-frontend-amc-outreach-description: Advanced mode provides expanded functionality of History pages, Watchlist pages, Recent changes, and other editor tools on mobile.
mobile-frontend-amc-outreach-enabled-mes: Advanced mode is now enabled. You can turn it off in your settings.
mobile-frontend-amc-outreach-dismissed-m: You can enable Advanced mode at any time in your Settings.
mobile-frontend-beta-only: Feature only available in beta mode
mobile-frontend-console-recruit: Learn more about how we build our mobile site @ https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:MobileFrontend
mobile-frontend-special-pages-pref: Optimize and simplify special pages when on mobile (recommended)
